text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright
Sky a canvas white
Whispers in the air
Moon with silver glare

[Verse 2]
Walking hand in hand
Footprints in the sand
Echoes of the night
Everything feels right

[Chorus]
Under moonlight's spell
Everything feels well
Hearts begin to swell
Stories we can tell

[Bridge]
Clouds are drifting by
Dreams so high we fly
Laughter in the breeze
Serenity with ease

[Verse 3]
Crickets sing their song
Night won't last for long
Moments frozen still
Hearts they start to fill

[Chorus]
Under moonlight's spell
Everything feels well
Hearts begin to swell
Stories we can tell
title: Moonlit Night
